title: (x) Slim Sans-Serif / rounded DIN Condensed for Scrollan - Gravur Condensed {Florian}
content:
Does anyone know the typeface used on The Heads of Stateâ€™s Shopify page? Thanks much for your time. Your feedback and suggestion will help immensely!

author: Taiwanese

comments.content:
This is just DIN, inn't?

Or DIN Condensed with the tracking opened up??
This is [Gravur Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20101114152826/http:/www.lineto.com/The+Fonts/Font+Categories/Text+Fonts/Gravur+Condensed/Regular), and your sample is from scrollan.de.
Bingo! Awesome Florian Hardwig! You Rock and thank you so much for your help on this. Also, thank you for Begsini as well!
